author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 132 educated youths got placements at the mega job mela organised by the Tamil Nadu Rural Livelihood Mission (TNRLM) and the Mahalir Thittam here on Saturday.

The mela was organised at the Nesamony Memorial Christian College in Marthandam.

Inaugurating the mela, T. Sadayappa Vinayaga Murthy, Project Director of TNRLM said that this was the second mega mela organised as per the directions of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.

A total number of 24 companies from Thiruvananthapuram, Chennai, Coimbatore, Bengaluru and local firms participated in the mela.

For sustained livelihood

It was organised with a view to give sustained livelihood for the educated unemployed youths in the region.

As many as 1,831 youths thronged the job mela from across the district and neighbouring districts, Mr. Vinayaga Murthy said. Assistant Project Officers A. Antony Siluvai, block development officers in rural development department and officials from Mahalir Thittam participated.
title: 132 youth get placements in job mela
